Постоянные
магниты

Research & Production Company ERGA

Russian largest manufacturer
of magnetic systems and industrial equipment

About ERGA

The key activity of the company is development and production of equipment for mineral processing, air-gravity separation, complete solutions for the processing of various waste and separation of materials by electrical properties.

  • Research

    LIMiTS testing laboratory / Testing laboratory for mineral and industrial raw materials

  • Design

    Design and engineering solution of the tasks

  • Production

    > 25 000 m² of modern production faciities

  • Implementation

    Professional service support: supervision and commissioning works, equipment diagnostics and repair, training of the customer's maintenance personnel

  • ISO 9001: 2015 quality system

  • > 200 qualified employees

  • Full production cycle

  • Successful experience in export deliveries

Industries

  • Mining

  • Food

  • Recycling

and processing industry

OUR TRADEMARKS

  • Erga-1

    Production of magnetic separators, iron separators and specialized equipment ERGA produces more than 60 types of industrial and laboratory equipment under ERGA trademark. ERGA equipment is continuously improved and modernized, thus ensuring high performance, operational reliability and safety while increasing cost efficiency of their application.
